sources.title: Foxy Flatfoots (1946)
sources.description: The Fox and the Crow become private detectives as the snooping business appears to best suit their talents -- this time out, at least -- and go snooping where they aren't wanted. A wise and crafty old Owl makes them sorry they didn't choose a different profession. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/foxy-flatfoots-1946/

metadata.Plot: The Fox and the Crow become private detectives as the snooping business appears to best suit their talents -- this time out, at least -- and go snooping where they aren't wanted. A wise and crafty old Owl makes them sorry they didn't choose a different profession.
